name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Anthony DiCONDINA, Appellant

judges: Prior report: 377 Pa.Super. 650, 541 A.2d 1149. Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Anthony DiCONDINA, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Petition to Dismiss granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joel S. Moldovsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., George Leone, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
568 A.2d 178
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Anthony DiCONDINA, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 12, 1989.
Decided Jan. 5, 1990.
Joel S. Moldovsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., George Leone, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Prior report: 377 Pa.Super. 650, 541 A.2d 1149. Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
